column4: so I want to look at a whole lot of porn on my new Ubuntu install, how do I keep my wife from finding all of it?
well we only want to have one account I have to keep it like a secret
but she'll know about it then
she's pretty bright she'll look at the logs
add a . in front of the filename and its hidden, unless you have show hidden files turned on
she's used it a whole lot more than I have
install: see, that would leave logs
I can't hide anything from her, I kinda want to look at like redtube, xtube, and *chan but like I can't clear the history either
I might have to just not use linux if you guys can't help me solve this :(
in fact I'm kinda getting there right now
is there anyway to crapflood the logs?
so it gets like wiped and i can just say we got hacked. linux is pretty insecure right?
